name: Probability Drive
description:
A side scrolling shooter where the dice control how powerful your ship is, and how fast the enemies are!

Roll the dice move them to fill in all the empty dice locations. 

Hit the Go button to start the mission 

Control your ship with arrow keys

Space to shoot

Didn't quite get everything where we wanted by the end of the Jam, but had a lot of fun!

Issues:

Enemy spawning is random and kinda all over the place.  The game gets more difficult the longer you last though, so once it picks up, it does get kinda crazy!

We wanted to make it so you could assign dice to each enemy type to really make each run unique, but just ran outta time.  Two people game jamming is HARD!

Anyways, hope you enjoy!  -Syeblaze and Kanaradas
